title: Numbers 27:21
content: 21 And he shall stand before the face of Eleazar the priest, and he shall ask for him by the judgment of the Urim before the face of Yahweh. In accordance with his mouth he shall go out and in accordance with his mouth he shall come in, he and all the sons of Israel with him and all the congregation.”

title: Numbers 27:22
content: 22 And Moses did just as Yahweh had commanded him, and he took Joshua and stood him before the face of Eleazar the priest and before the face of all the congregation,

title: Numbers 27:23
content: 23 and he laid his hands on him, and he commanded him, just as Yahweh had spoken by the hand of Moses.

title: Numbers 28:1
content: 1 And Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

title: Numbers 28:2
content: 2 “Command the sons of Israel and say to them, ‘You shall be careful to offer to me at its appointed time my offering, my food for my offerings made by fire, an aroma of my soothing.’

title: Numbers 28:3
content: 3 And you shall say to them, ‘This is the offering made by fire that you shall offer to Yahweh: unblemished male lambs, sons of a year, two for the day, a burnt offering continually.

title: Numbers 28:4
content: 4 One male lamb you shall do in the morning, and the second male lamb you shall do between the evenings,

title: Numbers 28:5
content: 5 and the tenth of an ephah of fine flour for a grain offering, mixed with the fourth of a hin of beaten oil.

title: Numbers 28:6
content: 6 It is a burnt offering of continuity, the one done at Mount Sinai for an aroma of soothing, an offering made by fire to Yahweh.

title: Numbers 28:7
content: 7 And its drink offering shall be the fourth of a hin for one male lamb. You shall pour out in the holy place a drink offering of intoxicating drink to Yahweh.

title: Numbers 28:8
content: 8 And you shall do the second male lamb between the evenings. You shall do like the grain offering of the morning and its drink offering, an offering made by fire, an aroma of soothing to Yahweh.

title: Numbers 28:9
content: 9 And on the Sabbath day: two unblemished male lambs, sons of a year, and two-tenths fine flour as a grain offering mixed with the oil, and its drink offering

title: Numbers 28:10
content: 10 {are} the burnt offering of the Sabbath by its Sabbath, in addition to the burnt offering of the continuity and its drink offering.

title: Numbers 28:11
content: 11 And at the heads of your months, you shall offer a burnt offering to Yahweh: two bulls, sons of cattle, and one ram, seven male lambs, sons of a year, unblemished;

title: Numbers 28:12
content: 12 and three-tenths fine flour as a grain offering mixed with the oil for one bull, and two-tenths fine flour as a grain offering mixed with the oil for the one ram,

title: Numbers 28:13
content: 13 and a tenth, a tenth fine flour as a grain offering mixed with the oil for one male lamb. It is a burnt offering, an aroma of soothing, an offering made by fire to Yahweh.

title: Numbers 28:14
content: 14 And their drink offerings shall be half of a hin of wine for the bull and a third of a hin for the ram and a fourth of a hin for the male lamb. This shall be the burnt offering of the month by its month for the months of the year.

title: Numbers 28:15
content: 15 And one buck of the goats shall be done as a sin offering to Yahweh in addition to the burnt offering of the continuity and its drink offering.

title: Numbers 28:16
content: 16 And in the first month, on day 14 of the month is the Passover of Yahweh.

title: Numbers 28:17
content: 17 And on day 15 of this month shall be a feast. Seven days you shall eat unleavened bread.

title: Numbers 28:18
content: 18 On the first day shall be a convocation of holiness. You shall not do any work of labor,

title: Numbers 28:19
content: 19 and you shall offer an offering made by fire, a burnt offering to Yahweh: two bulls, sons of cattle, and one ram, and seven male lambs, sons of a year. They shall be unblemished for you.

title: Numbers 28:20
content: 20 And their grain offering: you shall do fine flour mixed with the oil, three-tenths for the bull and two-tenths for the ram.

title: Numbers 28:21
content: 21 A tenth, a tenth you shall do for one male lamb of the seven male lambs,

title: Numbers 28:22
content: 22 and one male goat as the sin offering to make atonement for yourselves.

title: Numbers 28:23
content: 23 You shall do these apart from the burnt offering of the morning, which is for the burnt offering of the continuity.

title: Numbers 28:24
content: 24 You shall do like these for the day, seven days, the food of the offering made by fire, an aroma of soothing to Yahweh. It shall be done in addition to the burnt offering of the continuity and its drink offering.

title: Numbers 28:25
content: 25 And on the seventh day there shall be a convocation of holiness for you. You shall not do any work of labor.

title: Numbers 28:26
content: 26 And on the day of the firstfruits, when you offer the new grain offering to Yahweh in your festival of weeks, there shall be a convocation of holiness for you. You shall not do any work of labor.

title: Numbers 28:27
content: 27 And you shall offer a burnt offering as an aroma of soothing to Yahweh: two bulls, sons of cattle, one ram, seven male lambs, sons of a year,

title: Numbers 28:28
content: 28 And their grain offering shall be fine flour mixed with the oil, three-tenths for one bull, two-tenths for the one ram,

title: Numbers 28:29
content: 29 a tenth, a tenth for one male lamb of the seven of the male lambs,

title: Numbers 28:30
content: 30 one buck of the goats to make atonement for yourselves.

title: Numbers 28:31
content: 31 You shall do apart from the burnt offering of the continuity and its grain offering (they shall be unblemished for you) and their drink offerings.’”

title: Numbers 29:1
content: 1 “And in the seventh month, on the first of the month, there shall be a convocation of holiness for you. You shall not do any work of labor. It shall be a day of horn blowing for you.

title: Numbers 29:2
content: 2 And you shall do a burnt offering for an aroma of soothing to Yahweh: one bull, a son of cattle, one ram, seven male lambs, sons of a year, unblemished.

title: Numbers 29:3
content: 3 And their grain offering shall be fine flour mixed with the oil, three-tenths for the bull, two-tenths for the ram,

title: Numbers 29:4
content: 4 and one-tenth for one male lamb of the seven male lambs.

title: Numbers 29:5
content: 5 And one buck of the goats shall be a sin offering to make atonement for yourselves.

title: Numbers 29:6
content: 6 It is apart from the burnt offering of the month and its grain offering, and the burnt offering of the continuity and its grain offering, and their drink offerings according to their ordinance, for an aroma of soothing, an offering made by fire to Yahweh.

title: Numbers 29:7
content: 7 And on the tenth of this seventh month there shall be a convocation of holiness for you. And you shall afflict your lives. You shall not do any work.

title: Numbers 29:8
content: 8 And you shall offer a burnt offering to Yahweh, an aroma of soothing: one bull, a son of cattle, one ram, seven male lambs, sons of a year. They shall be unblemished for you.

title: Numbers 29:9
content: 9 And their grain offering shall be fine flour mixed with the oil, three-tenths for the bull, two-tenths for the one ram,

title: Numbers 29:10
content: 10 a tenth, a tenth for the one male lamb, for the seven male lambs.

title: Numbers 29:11
content: 11 One buck of the goats shall be a sin offering, apart from the sin offering of the atonement and the burnt offering of the continuity and its grain offering and their drink offerings.

title: Numbers 29:12
content: 12 And on day 15 of the seventh month there shall be for you a convocation of holiness. You shall not do any work of labor, and you shall feast a feast to Yahweh seven days.

title: Numbers 29:13
content: 13 And you shall offer a burnt offering, a sacrifice made by fire, an aroma of soothing to Yahweh, 13 bulls, sons of cattle, two rams, 14 male lambs, sons of a year. They shall be unblemished.

title: Numbers 29:14
content: 14 And their grain offering shall be fine flour mixed with the oil, three-tenths for one bull for the 13 bulls, two-tenths for one ram for the two rams,

title: Numbers 29:15
content: 15 and a tenth, a tenth for one male lamb for the 14 male lambs.

title: Numbers 29:16
content: 16 And one buck of the goats shall be a sin offering, apart from the burnt offering of the continuity, its grain offering, and its drink offering.

title: Numbers 29:17
content: 17 And on the second day: 12 bulls, sons of cattle, two rams, 14 male lambs, sons of a year, unblemished,

title: Numbers 29:18
content: 18 and their grain offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the male lambs shall be by their number according to the ordinance.

title: Numbers 29:19
content: 19 And one buck of the goats shall be a sin offering, apart from the burnt offering of the continuity, and its grain offering, and their drink offerings.

title: Numbers 29:20
content: 20 And on the third day: 11 bulls, two rams, 14 male lambs, sons of a year, unblemished,

title: Numbers 29:21
content: 21 and their grain offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the male lambs shall be by their number according to the ordinance,

title: Numbers 29:22
content: 22 and one male goat of the sin offering, apart from the burnt offering of the continuity and its grain offering and its drink offering.

title: Numbers 29:23
content: 23 And on the fourth day: 10 bulls, two rams, 14 male lambs, sons of a year, unblemished,

title: Numbers 29:24
content: 24 and their grain offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be by their number according to the ordinance.

title: Numbers 29:25
content: 25 And one buck of the goats shall be a sin offering, apart from the burnt offering of the continuity, its grain offering, and its drink offering.

title: Numbers 29:26
content: 26 And on the fifth day: nine bulls, two rams, 14 male lambs, sons of a year, unblemished,

title: Numbers 29:27
content: 27 and their grain offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be by their number according to the ordinance,

title: Numbers 29:28
content: 28 and one male goat of a sin offering, apart from the burnt offering of the continuity, and its grain offering, and its drink offering.

title: Numbers 29:29
content: 29 And on the sixth day: eight bulls, two rams, 14 male lambs, sons of a year, unblemished,

title: Numbers 29:30
content: 30 and their grain offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be by their number according to the ordinance,

title: Numbers 29:31
content: 31 and one male goat of a sin offering, apart from the burnt offering of the continuity, its grain offering, and its drink offerings.

title: Numbers 29:32
content: 32 And on the seventh day: seven bulls, two rams, 14 male lambs, sons of a year, unblemished,

title: Numbers 29:33
content: 33 and their grain offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the male lambs, shall be by their number according to their ordinance,

title: Numbers 29:34
content: 34 and one male goat of the sin offering, apart from the burnt offering of the continuity, its grain offering, and its drink offering.

title: Numbers 29:35
content: 35 On the eighth day an assembly shall be for you. You shall not do any work of labor.

title: Numbers 29:36
content: 36 And you shall offer a burnt offering, an offering made by fire, an aroma of soothing to Yahweh: one bull, one ram, seven male lambs, sons of a year, unblemished.

title: Numbers 29:37
content: 37 Their grain offering and their drink offerings, for the bull, for the ram, and for the male lambs, shall be by their number according to the ordinance,

title: Numbers 29:38
content: 38 and one male goat of the sin offering apart from the burnt offering of the continuity and its grain offering and its drink offering.

title: Numbers 29:39
content: 39 You shall do these for Yahweh at your appointed times, apart from your vows and your voluntary offerings, for your burnt offerings, and for your grain offerings, and for your drink offerings, and for your peace offerings.”

title: Numbers 29:40
content: 40 And Moses spoke to the sons of Israel according to all that Yahweh had commanded Moses.

title: Numbers 30:1
content: 1 And Moses spoke to the heads of the tribes of the sons of Israel, saying, “This is the word that Yahweh has commanded:

title: Numbers 30:2
content: 2 When a man vows a vow to Yahweh or swears an oath to bind a binding vow on his life, he shall not profane his word. He shall do according to all that came out from his mouth.

title: Numbers 30:3
content: 3 And if a woman vows a vow to Yahweh and binds a binding vow in the house of her father, in her youth,

title: Numbers 30:4
content: 4 and her father hears her vow and her binding vow that she bound on her life, and her father is silent to her, then all her vows shall stand, and every binding vow that she has bound on her life shall stand.

title: Numbers 30:5
content: 5 And if her father forbids her on the day of his hearing, any of her vows and her binding vows that she bound on her life shall not stand, and Yahweh will forgive her, because her father forbade her.

title: Numbers 30:6
content: 6 And if she ever belongs to a man, and her vows are on her, or thoughtless speech of her lips that she has bound is on her life,

title: Numbers 30:7
content: 7 and her husband hears on the day of his hearing and is silent to her, then her vows shall stand, and her binding vows that she bound on her life shall stand.

title: Numbers 30:8
content: 8 And if her husband forbids her on the day of his hearing, then he breaks her vow which is on her and the thoughtless speech of her lips that she bound on her life, and Yahweh will forgive her.

title: Numbers 30:9
content: 9 And the vow of a widow and a driven out woman, all that she binds on her life shall stand on her.

title: Numbers 30:10
content: 10 And if she vowed or bound a binding vow on her life by an oath in the house of her husband,

title: Numbers 30:11
content: 11 and her husband hears and is silent to her, he does not forbid her, then all her vows shall stand, and every binding vow that she bound on her life shall stand.

title: Numbers 30:12
content: 12 And if her husband ever breaks them on the day of his hearing, all that went out of her lips for her vows and for the binding vow of her life shall not stand. Her husband has broken them, and Yahweh will forgive her.

title: Numbers 30:13
content: 13 Every vow and every oath of a binding vow to afflict her life, her husband may make it stand, and her husband may break it.

title: Numbers 30:14
content: 14 And if her husband is wholly silent to her from day to day, then he will make all her vows or all her binding vows which are on her stand. He made them stand because he was silent to her on the day of his hearing.

title: Numbers 30:15
content: 15 And if he ever breaks them after his hearing, then he will bear her iniquity.”

title: Numbers 30:16
content: 16 These are the statutes that Yahweh commanded Moses, between a man and his wife, between a father and his daughter in her youth in the house of her father.

title: Numbers 31:1
content: 1 And Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

title: Numbers 31:2
content: 2 “Take vengeance, the vengeance of the sons of Israel, from with the Midianites. Afterward you shall be gathered to your people.”

title: Numbers 31:3
content: 3 And Moses spoke to the people, saying, “Equip yourselves, some of the men with you, for the war. And they will be against Midian to give the vengeance of Yahweh on Midian.

title: Numbers 31:4
content: 4 You shall send to the war for all the tribes of Israel, a thousand for a tribe, a thousand for a tribe.”

title: Numbers 31:5
content: 5 And a thousand for a tribe were provided from the thousands of Israel, 12, 000 equipped for battle.

title: Numbers 31:6
content: 6 And Moses sent them to the war, a thousand for a tribe, them and Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest to the war. And the vessels of holiness and the blasting trumpets were in his hand.

title: Numbers 31:7
content: 7 And they waged war against Midian, just as Yahweh had commanded Moses, and they slew every male.

title: Numbers 31:8
content: 8 And they slew the kings of Midian with their pierced ones: Evi and Rekem and Zur and Hur and Reba, the five kings of Midian; and they slew Balaam the son of Beor by the sword.

title: Numbers 31:9
content: 9 And the sons of Israel took captive the women of Midian and their children, and they plundered all their animals and all their livestock and all their wealth.

title: Numbers 31:10
content: 10 And they burned with the fire all their cities with their dwellings and all their encampments.

title: Numbers 31:11
content: 11 And they took all the spoil and all the booty of human and of animal.

title: Numbers 31:12
content: 12 And they brought to Moses and to Eleazar the priest and to the congregation of the sons of Israel, the captives and the booty and the spoil to the camp at the plains of Moab, which are beside the Jordan at Jericho.

title: Numbers 31:13
content: 13 And Moses and Eleazar the priest and all the leaders of the congregation went out to meet them at the outside of the camp.

title: Numbers 31:14
content: 14 And Moses was furious with the appointed ones of the army, the leaders of the thousands and the leaders of the hundreds, the ones coming from the battle of the war.

title: Numbers 31:15
content: 15 And Moses said to them, “Have you let every woman live?

title: Numbers 31:16
content: 16 Look, these were by the word of Balaam for the sons of Israel to commit unfaithfulness against Yahweh concerning the matter of Peor, and the plague was among the congregation of Yahweh.

title: Numbers 31:17
content: 17 And now, slay every male among the children and slay every woman who has known a man by the bed of a male.

title: Numbers 31:18
content: 18 And keep alive for yourselves every child among the women who has not known the bed of a male.

title: Numbers 31:19
content: 19 And you, camp outside of the camp seven days, all who have slain a person and all who have touched a pierced one. Purify yourselves on the third day and on the seventh day, you and your captives,

title: Numbers 31:20
content: 20 and you shall purify every garment and every vessel of skin and every work of goats and every vessel of wood.”

title: Numbers 31:21
content: 21 And Eleazar the priest said to the men of the army who had gone to the battle, “This is a statute of the law that Yahweh has commanded Moses:

title: Numbers 31:22
content: 22 Only the gold and the silver, the bronze, the iron, the tin, and the lead,

title: Numbers 31:23
content: 23 every thing that can come through the fire you shall pass through the fire, and it will become clean. However, it shall be purified with the water of purification, and all that can not come through the fire you shall pass through the water.

title: Numbers 31:24
content: 24 And you shall wash your garments on the seventh day, and you will be clean, and afterward you may enter into the camp.”

title: Numbers 31:25
content: 25 And Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

title: Numbers 31:26
content: 26 “Lift up the head of the booty of the captives, of human and of animal, you and Eleazar the priest and the heads of the fathers of the congregation.

title: Numbers 31:27
content: 27 And you shall divide the booty between the wielders of the war who went out to the battle and all the congregation.

title: Numbers 31:28
content: 28 And you shall raise a tax for Yahweh from with the men of the war who went out to the battle, one life from 500, from human and from cattle and from the donkeys and from the flock.

title: Numbers 31:29
content: 29 You shall take from half of them and give the contribution of Yahweh to Eleazar the priest.

title: Numbers 31:30
content: 30 And from the half of the sons of Israel you shall take one taken from the 50, from human, from cattle, from the donkeys and from the flock, from every animal, and you shall give them to the Levites, the keepers of the keeping of the Dwelling of Yahweh.”

title: Numbers 31:31
content: 31 And Moses and Eleazar the priest did just as Yahweh had commanded Moses.

title: Numbers 31:32
content: 32 And the booty, the remainder of the plunder that the people of the army plundered, was 675, 000 sheep,

title: Numbers 31:33
content: 33 and 72, 000 cattle,

title: Numbers 31:34
content: 34 and 61, 000 donkeys,

title: Numbers 31:35
content: 35 and human lives, from the women who had not known the bed of a male, every life, 32, 000.

title: Numbers 31:36
content: 36 And the half of the portion of the ones who went out with the army: the number of the sheep was 337, 500.

title: Numbers 31:37
content: 37 And the tax for Yahweh from the flock was 675.

title: Numbers 31:38
content: 38 And the cattle were 36, 000 and their tax for Yahweh was 72.

title: Numbers 31:39
content: 39 And the donkeys were 30, 500, and their tax for Yahweh was 61.

title: Numbers 31:40
content: 40 And the human lives were 16, 000, and their tax for Yahweh was 32 lives.

title: Numbers 31:41
content: 41 And Moses gave the tax of the contribution of Yahweh to Eleazar the priest, just as Yahweh had commanded Moses.

title: Numbers 31:42
content: 42 And from the half of the sons of Israel whom Moses had divided from the men who waged war,

title: Numbers 31:43
content: 43 and the half of the congregation from the flock was 337, 500,

title: Numbers 31:44
content: 44 and 36, 000 cattle,

title: Numbers 31:45
content: 45 and 30, 500 donkeys,

title: Numbers 31:46
content: 46 and 16, 000 human lives.

title: Numbers 31:47
content: 47 And Moses took from the half of the sons of Israel the taken, one from the 50, from human and from animal, and he gave them to the Levites, the keepers of the keeping of the Dwelling of Yahweh, just as Yahweh had commanded Moses.

title: Numbers 31:48
content: 48 And the appointed ones who were for the thousands of the army, the leaders of the thousands and the leaders of the hundreds, came near to Moses.

title: Numbers 31:49
content: 49 And they said to Moses, “Your servants have lifted up the heads of the men of the war who were in our hand, and not a man from us is missing.

title: Numbers 31:50
content: 50 And we have offered the offering of Yahweh, a man what he found of the objects of gold, armlet, and bracelet, signet ring, earring, and ornament, to make atonement for our lives before the face of Yahweh.”

title: Numbers 31:51
content: 51 And Moses and Eleazar the priest took the gold from with them, every object of craft.

title: Numbers 31:52
content: 52 And all the gold of the contribution which they raised to Yahweh from with the leaders of the thousands and from with the leaders of the hundreds was 16, 750 shekels.

title: Numbers 31:53
content: 53 The men of the army had plundered, a man for himself.

title: Numbers 31:54
content: 54 And Moses and Eleazar the priest took the gold from with the leaders of the thousands and the hundreds, and they brought it to the tent of meeting, a memorial for the sons of Israel before the face of Yahweh.

title: Numbers 32:1
content: 1 And the livestock of the sons of Reuben and of the sons of Gad was great, very numerous. And they saw the land of Jazer and the land of Gilead, and behold, the place was a place of livestock.

title: Numbers 32:2
content: 2 And the sons of Gad and the sons of Reuben came and said to Moses and to Eleazar the priest and to the leaders of the congregation, saying,

title: Numbers 32:3
content: 3 “Ataroth, and Dibon, and Jazer, and Nimrah, and Heshbon, and Elealeh, and Sebam, and Nebo, and Beon

title: Numbers 32:4
content: 4 are the land that Yahweh struck before the face of the congregation of Israel. It is a land of livestock, and livestock belongs to your servants.”

title: Numbers 32:5
content: 5 And they said, “If we have found favor in your eyes, let this land be given to your servants as a possession. Do not make us cross over the Jordan.”

title: Numbers 32:6
content: 6 And Moses said to the sons of Gad and to the sons of Reuben, “Will your brothers go to the war and you yourselves will dwell here?

title: Numbers 32:7
content: 7 And why do you discourage the heart of the sons of Israel from crossing over into the land that Yahweh has given to them?

title: Numbers 32:8
content: 8 Thus your fathers did when I sent them from Kadesh Barnea to see the land.

title: Numbers 32:9
content: 9 And they went up as far as the wadi of Eshkol, and they saw the land and discouraged the heart of the sons of Israel to not enter into the land that Yahweh had given to them.

title: Numbers 32:10
content: 10 And the nose of Yahweh burned on that day, and he swore, saying,

title: Numbers 32:11
content: 11 ‘If the men who went up from Egypt, from a son of 20 years and upward, will see the ground which I swore to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob! For they are not fully after me,

title: Numbers 32:12
content: 12 except Caleb the son of Jephunneh the Kenizzite and Joshua the son of Nun, because they are fully after Yahweh.’

title: Numbers 32:13
content: 13 And the nose of Yahweh burned against Israel, and he made them wander in the wilderness 40 years until the finishing of all the generation who had done evil in the eyes of Yahweh.

title: Numbers 32:14
content: 14 And behold, you have risen up in place of your fathers, a brood of sinful men, to add more to the burning of the nose of Yahweh toward Israel.

title: Numbers 32:15
content: 15 If you turn from after him, then he will yet again leave him in the wilderness, and you will have destroyed all this people.”

title: Numbers 32:16
content: 16 And they came near to him and said, “Here we will build walls of the flock for our livestock and cities for our children.

title: Numbers 32:17
content: 17 And we ourselves will be equipped for war, hurrying before the face of the sons of Israel until when we have brought them into their place. And our children will dwell in the cities of the fortification because of the face of those who dwell in the land.

title: Numbers 32:18
content: 18 We will not return to our houses until the sons of Israel get an inheritance for themselves, a man his inheritance.

title: Numbers 32:19
content: 19 For we will not inherit with them from across of the Jordan and beyond, because our inheritance came to us from beyond the Jordan toward the sunrise.”

title: Numbers 32:20
content: 20 And Moses said to them, “If you do this thing, if you equip yourselves before the face of Yahweh for the war,

title: Numbers 32:21
content: 21 then every man equipped for war shall cross over the Jordan for you before the face of Yahweh, until he has dispossessed his enemy from his face

title: Numbers 32:22
content: 22 and the land is subdued before the face of Yahweh, then afterward you may return. And you will be free of obligation from Yahweh and from Israel, and this land will be for you for a possession before the face of Yahweh.

title: Numbers 32:23
content: 23 And if you do not do so, behold, you will have sinned against Yahweh, and know that your sin will find you.

title: Numbers 32:24
content: 24 Build for yourselves cities for your children and walls for your livestock, and you shall do what has gone out from your mouth.”

title: Numbers 32:25
content: 25 And the sons of Gad and the sons of Reuben spoke to Moses, saying, “Your servants will do just as my master is commanding.

title: Numbers 32:26
content: 26 Our children, our wives, our livestock, and all our animals will be there in the cities of the Gilead.

title: Numbers 32:27
content: 27 And your servants will cross over, every man equipped for war of the army, before the face of Yahweh for the war, just as my master has spoken.”

title: Numbers 32:28
content: 28 And Moses commanded Eleazar the priest and Joshua the son of Nun and the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the sons of Israel concerning them.

title: Numbers 32:29
content: 29 And Moses said to them, “If the sons of Gad and the sons of Reuben cross over the Jordan with you, every man equipped for the war before the face of Yahweh, and the land is subdued before your faces, then you will give to them the land of the Gilead as a possession.

title: Numbers 32:30
content: 30 And if the men equipped for war do not cross over with you, then they will take possession in your midst in the land of Canaan.”

title: Numbers 32:31
content: 31 And the sons of Gad and the sons of Reuben answered, saying, “What Yahweh has spoken to your servants, so we will do.

title: Numbers 32:32
content: 32 We will cross over, the men equipped for war, before the face of Yahweh into the land of Canaan. And with us will be the possession of our inheritance from beyond the Jordan.”

title: Numbers 32:33
content: 33 And Moses gave to them, to the sons of Gad and to the sons of Reuben, and to the half of the tribe of Manasseh the son of Joseph, the kingdom of Sihon the king of the Amorites and the kingdom of Og the king of the Bashan, the land of its cities with the borders of the cities of the surrounding land.

title: Numbers 32:34
content: 34 And the sons of Gad built Dibon and Ataroth and Aroer

title: Numbers 32:35
content: 35 and Atroth Shophan and Jazer and Jogbehah

title: Numbers 32:36
content: 36 and Beth Nimrah and Beth Haran, the cities of fortification and the walls of the flock.

title: Numbers 32:37
content: 37 And the sons of Reuben built Heshbon and Elealeh and Kiriathaim

title: Numbers 32:38
content: 38 and Nebo and Baal Meon (names were changed) and Sibmah. And they called the names of the cities that they built by names.

title: Numbers 32:39
content: 39 And the sons of Machir the son of Manasseh went to Gilead and captured it and dispossessed the Amorites who were in it.

title: Numbers 32:40
content: 40 And Moses gave the Gilead to Machir the son of Manasseh, and he dwelled in it.

title: Numbers 32:41
content: 41 And Jair the son of Manasseh went and captured their tent villages, and he called them Havvoth Jair.

title: Numbers 32:42
content: 42 And Nobah went and captured Kenath and its daughters. And he called it Nobah, by his name.

title: Numbers 33:1
content: 1 These are the journeys of the sons of Israel who went out from the land of Egypt according to their tribes by the hand of Moses and Aaron.

title: Numbers 33:2
content: 2 And Moses wrote down their departure points according to their tribes in accordance with the mouth of Yahweh, and these are their journeys according to their departure points.

title: Numbers 33:3
content: 3 And they set out from Rameses on the first month, on day 15 of the first month, from the day after the Passover the sons of Israel went out with a raised hand before the eyes of all the Egyptians.

title: Numbers 33:4
content: 4 And the Egyptians were burying those whom Yahweh had struck down, all the firstborn. And Yahweh enacted judgment against their gods.

title: Numbers 33:5
content: 5 And the sons of Israel set out from Rameses and camped at Succoth.

title: Numbers 33:6
content: 6 And they set out from Succoth and camped at Etham, which is at the edge of the wilderness.

title: Numbers 33:7
content: 7 And they set out from Etham and turned back to Pi Hahiroth, which is on the face of Baal Zephon, and they camped before the face of Migdol.

title: Numbers 33:8
content: 8 And they set out from the face of Hahiroth and passed through the midst of the sea to the wilderness, and they went a distance of three days in the wilderness of Etham and camped at Marah.

title: Numbers 33:9
content: 9 And they set out from Marah and came to Elim. And at Elim were 12 springs of water and 70 palm trees. And they camped there.

title: Numbers 33:10
content: 10 And they set out from Elim and camped beside the Sea of Reeds.

title: Numbers 33:11
content: 11 And they set out from the Sea of Reeds and camped in the wilderness of Sin.

title: Numbers 33:12
content: 12 And they set out from the wilderness of Sin and camped at Dophkah.

title: Numbers 33:13
content: 13 And they set out from Dophkah and camped at Alush.

title: Numbers 33:14
content: 14 And they set out from Alush and camped at Rephidim, and there was no water there for the people to drink.

title: Numbers 33:15
content: 15 And they set out from Rephidim and camped in the wilderness of Sinai.

title: Numbers 33:16
content: 16 And they set out from the wilderness of Sinai and camped at Kibroth Hattaavah.

title: Numbers 33:17
content: 17 And they set out from Kibroth Hattaavah and camped at Hazeroth.

title: Numbers 33:18
content: 18 And they set out from Hazeroth and camped at Rithmah.

title: Numbers 33:19
content: 19 And they set out from Rithmah and camped at Rimmon Perez.

title: Numbers 33:20
content: 20 And they set out from Rimmon Perez and camped at Libnah.

title: Numbers 33:21
content: 21 And they set out from Libnah and camped at Rissah.

title: Numbers 33:22
content: 22 And they set out from Rissah and camped at Kehelathah.

title: Numbers 33:23
content: 23 And they set out from Kehelathah and camped at Mount Shepher.

title: Numbers 33:24
content: 24 And they set out from Mount Shepher and camped at Haradah.

title: Numbers 33:25
content: 25 And they set out from Haradah and camped at Makheloth.

title: Numbers 33:26
content: 26 And they set out from Makheloth and camped at Tahath.

title: Numbers 33:27
content: 27 And they set out from Tahath and camped at Terah.

title: Numbers 33:28
content: 28 And they set out from Terah and camped at Mithkah.

title: Numbers 33:29
content: 29 And they set out from Mithkah and camped at Hashmonah.

title: Numbers 33:30
content: 30 And they set out from Hashmonah and camped at Moseroth.

title: Numbers 33:31
content: 31 And they set out from Moseroth and camped at Bene Jaakan.

title: Numbers 33:32
content: 32 And they set out from Bene Jaakan and camped at Hor Haggidgad.

title: Numbers 33:33
content: 33 And they set out from Hor Haggidgad and camped at Jotbathah.

title: Numbers 33:34
content: 34 And they set out from Jotbathah and camped at Abronah.

title: Numbers 33:35
content: 35 And they set out from Abronah and camped at Ezion Geber.

title: Numbers 33:36
content: 36 And they set out from Ezion Geber and camped in the wilderness of Zin (it is Kadesh).

title: Numbers 33:37
content: 37 And they set out from Kadesh and camped at Mount Hor, at the edge of the land of Edom.

title: Numbers 33:38
content: 38 And Aaron the priest went up to Mount Hor in accordance with the mouth of Yahweh and died there in the fortieth year of the going out of the sons of Israel from the land of Egypt, in the fifth month, on 1 of the month.

title: Numbers 33:39
content: 39 And Aaron was a son of 123 years when he died at Mount Hor.

title: Numbers 33:40
content: 40 And the Canaanite, the king of Arad (and he was dwelling in the Negev in the land of Canaan), heard when the sons of Israel came.

title: Numbers 33:41
content: 41 And they set out from Mount Hor and camped at Zalmonah.

title: Numbers 33:42
content: 42 And they set out from Zalmonah and camped at Punon.

title: Numbers 33:43
content: 43 And they set out from Punon and camped at Oboth.

title: Numbers 33:44
content: 44 And they set out from Oboth and camped at Iye Abarim, on the border of Moab.

title: Numbers 33:45
content: 45 And they set out from Iye and camped at Dibon Gad.

title: Numbers 33:46
content: 46 And they set out from Dibon Gad and camped at Almon Diblathaim.

title: Numbers 33:47
content: 47 And they set out from Almon Diblathaim and camped in the mountains of Abarim, before the face of Nebo.

title: Numbers 33:48
content: 48 And they set out from the mountains of Abarim and camped in the plains of Moab beside the Jordan at Jericho.

title: Numbers 33:49
content: 49 And they camped beside the Jordan, from Beth Jeshimoth to Abel Shittim in the plains of Moab.

title: Numbers 33:50
content: 50 And Yahweh spoke to Moses in the plains of Moab beside the Jordan at Jericho, saying,

title: Numbers 33:51
content: 51 “Speak to the sons of Israel and say to them, ‘When you cross over the Jordan into the land of Canaan,

title: Numbers 33:52
content: 52 then you shall dispossess all those who dwell in the land from your face, and you shall destroy all their carved figures, and you shall destroy all the figures of their molten metal, and you shall destroy all their high places.

title: Numbers 33:53
content: 53 And you shall take possession of the land and dwell in it, because I have given the land to you to possess it.

title: Numbers 33:54
content: 54 And you shall inherit for yourselves the land by lot, according to your clans. You shall increase his inheritance for the numerous, and you shall decrease his inheritance for the few. To there where the lot goes out for him, to him it will belong. According to the tribes of your fathers you shall inherit for yourselves.

title: Numbers 33:55
content: 55 And if you do not dispossess those who dwell in the land from your face, then whom you leave from them will be as thorns in your eyes and as pricks in your sides, and they shall vex you on the land that you are about to dwell in.

title: Numbers 33:56
content: 56 And it will happen that I will do to you just as I had intended to do to them.’”

title: Numbers 34:1
content: 1 And Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

title: Numbers 34:2
content: 2 “Command the sons of Israel and say to them, ‘When you enter into the land of Canaan, this is the land that has fallen to you as an inheritance, the land of Canaan and its borders,

title: Numbers 34:3
content: 3 and the corner of the south will be for you from the wilderness of Zin beside the hands of Edom. And the border of the south will be for you from the end of the Sea of Salt eastward.

title: Numbers 34:4
content: 4 And the border will turn for you from the south to the ascent of Akrabbim and cross over to Zin, and its outer limits will be from the south to Kadesh Barnea, and it will go out to Hazar Addar and cross over to Azmon.

title: Numbers 34:5
content: 5 And the border will turn from Azmon toward the wadi of Egypt, and its outer limits will be to the sea.

title: Numbers 34:6
content: 6 And the border of the west, it will be for you the Great Sea and the border. This will be for you the border of the west.

title: Numbers 34:7
content: 7 And this will be for you the border of the north, from the Great Sea you shall mark out for you to Mount Hor.

title: Numbers 34:8
content: 8 From Mount Hor you shall mark out to Lebo Hamath, and the outer limits of the border will be to Zedad.

title: Numbers 34:9
content: 9 And the border will go out to Ziphron and its outer limits will be at Hazar Enan. This will be for you the border of the north.

title: Numbers 34:10
content: 10 And you shall mark out for you the border to the east from Hazar Enan to Shepham.

title: Numbers 34:11
content: 11 And the border will go down from Shepham to Riblah, from east of Ain. And the border will go down and strike on the shoulder of the Sea of Kinnereth eastward.

title: Numbers 34:12
content: 12 And the border will go down to the Jordan and its outer limits will be the Sea of Salt. This will be for you the land according to its borders all around.’”

title: Numbers 34:13
content: 13 And Moses commanded the sons of Israel, saying, “This is the land, it which you will inherit for yourselves by lot, which Yahweh has commanded to give to the nine tribes and to the half of the tribe.

title: Numbers 34:14
content: 14 For the tribe of the sons of the Reubenites according to the house of their fathers and the tribe of the sons of the Gadites according to the house of their fathers have taken, and the half of the tribe of Manasseh has taken their inheritance.

title: Numbers 34:15
content: 15 The two tribes and the half of the tribe have taken their inheritance from beyond the Jordan at Jericho eastward, toward the sunrise.”

title: Numbers 34:16
content: 16 And Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

title: Numbers 34:17
content: 17 “These are the names of the men who will divide the land for you as an inheritance: Eleazar the priest and Joshua the son of Nun.

title: Numbers 34:18
content: 18 And you shall take one leader, one leader from a tribe to divide the land as an inheritance.

title: Numbers 34:19
content: 19 And these are the names of the men: of the tribe of Judah, Caleb the son of Jephunneh;

title: Numbers 34:20
content: 20 and of the tribe of the sons of Simeon, Shemuel the son of Ammihud;

title: Numbers 34:21
content: 21 of the tribe of Benjamin, Elidad the son of Kislon;

title: Numbers 34:22
content: 22 and of the tribe of the sons of Dan a leader, Bukki the son of Jogli;

title: Numbers 34:23
content: 23 of the sons of Joseph, of the tribe of the sons of Manasseh a leader, Hanniel the son of Ephod;

title: Numbers 34:24
content: 24 and of the tribe of the sons of Ephraim a leader, Kemuel the son of Shiphtan;

title: Numbers 34:25
content: 25 and of the tribe of the sons of Zebulun a leader, Elizaphan the son of Parnak;

title: Numbers 34:26
content: 26 and of the tribe of the sons of Issachar a leader, Paltiel the son of Azzan;

title: Numbers 34:27
content: 27 and of the tribe of the sons of Asher a leader, Ahihud the son of Shelomi;

title: Numbers 34:28
content: 28 and of the tribe of the sons of Naphtali a leader, Pedahel the son of Ammihud.”

title: Numbers 34:29
content: 29 These are whom Yahweh commanded to divide an inheritance for the sons of Israel in the land of Canaan.

title: Numbers 35:1
content: 1 And Yahweh spoke to Moses in the plains of Moab beside the Jordan at Jericho, saying,

title: Numbers 35:2
content: 2 “Command the sons of Israel, and they shall give to the Levites cities for dwelling from the inheritance of their possession, and you shall give to the Levites pastureland for the cities, all around them.

title: Numbers 35:3
content: 3 And the cities will be for them for dwelling, and their pastureland will be for their livestock and for their property and for all their living things.

title: Numbers 35:4
content: 4 And the pasturelands of the cities that you shall give to the Levites shall be from the wall of the city and outward 1, 000 cubits all around.

title: Numbers 35:5
content: 5 And you shall measure 2, 000 by the cubit from outside of the city toward the corner of the east, and 2, 000 by the cubit to the corner of the south, and 2, 000 by the cubit to the corner of the west, and 2, 000 by the cubit to the corner of the north, and the city will be in the middle. This will be the pastureland of the cities for them.

title: Numbers 35:6
content: 6 And along with the cities which you shall give to the Levites, you shall give six cities of refuge to which the one who kills may flee, and in addition to them you shall give 42 cities.

title: Numbers 35:7
content: 7 All the cities that you shall give to the Levites shall be 48 cities, them and their pasturelands.

title: Numbers 35:8
content: 8 And the cities that you shall give from the possession of the sons of Israel, you shall increase from with the numerous, and you shall decrease from with the few. A man shall give from his cities to the Levites according to the mouth of his inheritance that he has inherited.”

title: Numbers 35:9
content: 9 And Yahweh spoke to Moses, saying,

title: Numbers 35:10
content: 10 “Speak to the sons of Israel and say to them, ‘When you cross over the Jordan into the land of Canaan,

title: Numbers 35:11
content: 11 then you shall choose for yourselves cities; they will be cities of refuge for you, and the one who kills, the one who struck down a person by mistake, shall flee to there.

title: Numbers 35:12
content: 12 And the cities will be for you for refuge from the avenger, and the one who kills will not die until he stands before the face of the congregation for the judgment.

title: Numbers 35:13
content: 13 And the cities that you shall give shall be six cities of refuge for you.

title: Numbers 35:14
content: 14 You shall give three cities from beyond the Jordan, and you shall give three cities in the land of Canaan. They shall be cities of refuge.

title: Numbers 35:15
content: 15 For the sons of Israel, and for the sojourner, and for the temporary dweller in your midst, these six cities shall be for refuge to flee to, every one who has struck down a person by mistake.

title: Numbers 35:16
content: 16 And if he struck him down with an object of iron and he died, he is one who murders. The one who murders shall certainly be put to death.

title: Numbers 35:17
content: 17 And if he struck him down with a stone in hand by which one could die and he died, he is one who murders. The one who murders shall certainly be put to death.

title: Numbers 35:18
content: 18 Or if he struck him down with an object of wood in hand by which one could die and he died, he is one who murders. The one who murders shall certainly be put to death.

title: Numbers 35:19
content: 19 The avenger of blood, he shall put the one who murders to death. When he meets him, he shall put him to death.

title: Numbers 35:20
content: 20 And if with hatred he pushes him or throws something at him by lying in wait, and he dies,

title: Numbers 35:21
content: 21 or if with hostility he strikes him down with his hand, and he dies, you shall certainly put to death the one who strikes down; he is one who murders. The avenger of blood shall put to death the one who murders, when he meets him.

title: Numbers 35:22
content: 22 And if with suddenness without hostility he pushes him or throws any object at him without lying in wait,

title: Numbers 35:23
content: 23 or if with any stone by which one could die without seeing he drops it on him and he dies and he was not an enemy to him and was not seeking his harm,

title: Numbers 35:24
content: 24 then the congregation shall judge between the one who struck down and the avenger of blood in accordance with these judgments.

title: Numbers 35:25
content: 25 And the congregation shall rescue the one who kills from the hand of the avenger of blood, and the congregation shall bring him back into the city of his refuge to which he had fled, and he shall dwell in it until the death of the great priest, him whom he anointed with the oil of holiness.

title: Numbers 35:26
content: 26 And if the one who kills ever goes out of the border of the city of his refuge to which he has fled,

title: Numbers 35:27
content: 27 and the avenger of blood finds him outside the border of the city of his refuge, and the avenger of blood kills the one who kills, there will be no blood against him.

title: Numbers 35:28
content: 28 For in the city of his refuge he shall dwell until the death of the great priest, and after the death of the great priest the one who kills may return to the land of his possession.

title: Numbers 35:29
content: 29 And these shall be for you as a statute of judgment for your generations in all your dwellings.

title: Numbers 35:30
content: 30 Every one who strikes down a person, according to the mouth of witnesses he shall kill the one who kills. And one witness shall not testify against a person to put to death.

title: Numbers 35:31
content: 31 And you shall not take a ransom for the life of one who kills, he who is guilty to die, because he shall certainly be put to death.

title: Numbers 35:32
content: 32 And you shall not take a ransom for the one who flees into the city of his refuge, to return to dwell in the land until the death of the priest.

title: Numbers 35:33
content: 33 And you shall not pollute the land which you are in because the blood itself pollutes the land. And atonement cannot be made for the land for the blood that is poured out on it except by the blood of the one who poured it out.

title: Numbers 35:34
content: 34 And you shall not defile the land which you are dwelling in, which I am dwelling in the midst of, because I, Yahweh, am dwelling in the midst of the sons of Israel.’”

title: Numbers 36:1
content: 1 And the heads of the fathers of the clans of the sons of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, from the clans of the sons of Joseph, came near and spoke before the face of Moses and before the face of the leaders, the heads of the fathers of the sons of Israel.

title: Numbers 36:2
content: 2 And they said, “Yahweh commanded my master to give the land as an inheritance by lot to the sons of Israel, and my master was commanded by Yahweh to give the inheritance of Zelophehad our brother to his daughters.

title: Numbers 36:3
content: 3 And they will become wives for one from the sons of the tribes of the sons of Israel, and their inheritance will be withdrawn from the inheritance of our fathers, and it will be added onto the inheritance of the tribe that they belong to, and it will be withdrawn from the lot of our inheritance.

title: Numbers 36:4
content: 4 And when it will be the Jubilee for the sons of Israel, then their inheritance will be added onto the inheritance of the tribe which they belong to, and their inheritance will be withdrawn from the inheritance of the tribe of our fathers.”

title: Numbers 36:5
content: 5 And Moses commanded the sons of Israel in accordance with the mouth of Yahweh, saying, “What the tribe of the sons of Joseph is speaking is right.

title: Numbers 36:6
content: 6 This is the word that Yahweh commands to the daughters of Zelophehad, saying, ‘They may become wives of the good one in their eyes, only they shall become wives of the clan of the tribe of their father.

title: Numbers 36:7
content: 7 And an inheritance of the sons of Israel shall not go around from tribe to tribe, but a man of the sons of Israel shall cling to the inheritance of the tribe of his father.

title: Numbers 36:8
content: 8 And every daughter who possesses an inheritance from the tribes of the sons of Israel shall become a wife for one from the clan of the tribe of her father, so that the sons of Israel will have a possession, a man, the inheritance of his fathers.

title: Numbers 36:9
content: 9 And an inheritance shall not go around from a tribe to another tribe, but each tribe of the sons of Israel shall cling to his inheritance.’”

title: Numbers 36:10
content: 10 Just as Yahweh commanded Moses, so did the daughters of Zelophehad.

title: Numbers 36:11
content: 11 And Mahlah, Tirzah and Hoglah and Milkah and Noah, the daughters of Zelophehad, became wives for the sons of their uncles.

title: Numbers 36:12
content: 12 They became wives from the clans of the sons of Manasseh, the son of Joseph, and their inheritance was with the tribe of the clan of their father.

title: Numbers 36:13
content: 13 These are the commands and the judgments that Yahweh commanded by the hand of Moses to the sons of Israel in the plains of Moab beside the Jordan at Jericho.
